instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115-b Slow loading Everything and pin wheeling.. No WTR
threads.message:
Hey guys 82-3115-b,
Board looks good no signs of water damage.. Everything takes for ever to load. Replaced ram. Even when i try to load from a usb it does load but takes a very long time..

threads.title: 820-3115-b Slow loading Everything and pin wheeling.. No WTR
threads.message: Update i disconnected trackpad loaded it up and then re connected trackpad. Everything works fine.. What caused this and the solution i just provided I don't feel comfortable with.

threads.title: 820-3115-b Slow loading Everything and pin wheeling.. No WTR
threads.message: If you ran ASD before the fault you'd see exactly what sensor was causing the problem. I'd run 3S155 and see if anything funny shows up.

threads.title: 820-3115-b Slow loading Everything and pin wheeling.. No WTR
threads.message: What is 3S155 i dont have the ASD or know how to run them..
